name: Screaming_girl
text:
Screaming girl
You may be looking for Ruby.
An unidentified student at Twin Peaks High School ran through the school's courtyard, screaming, after learning that Laura Palmer had been murdered that morning. She was seen by the students in Ms. Honeycutt's class.
In 2016, the Fireman briefly showed Andy Brennan a vision of the screaming girl at his palace.
The shot of the girl running also appears in the pre-title sequence of "Part 1."
